scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n ORCH-BE,ORCH-FE,RESOLVER,REGISTRAR -c blue,green,magenta,yellow "npm run dev -w backend" "npm run dev -w frontend" "cd ../ant-resolver && npm run dev" "cd ../ant-registrar && npm run dev"
scripts.demo: npm run kill && concurrently -k -n ORCH-BE,ORCH-FE,RESOLVER,OPEN -c blue,green,magenta,cyan "npm run dev -w backend" "npm run dev -w frontend" "cd ../ant-resolver && npm run dev" "node scripts/openWhenReady.js"
